sql-case.value: CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password DEFAULT TABLESPACE tablespace1
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password CONTAINER = ALL
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password QUOTA 1M ON tablespace1
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password PASSWORD EXPIRE
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password ACCOUNT LOCK
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password PASSWORD EXPIRE ACCOUNT LOCK
